title: ennEramum un
sahitya:
ennEramum un pAda kamala dhyAnam sheidu koNDunnai nambinEn nambinEn nambinEn


anupallavi

  ennai rakSikka shonnEn sonda maindan nAnallavO annai pinnaiyuNDO enakku akhilANDEshvari shankari


caraNam 1    Adi shakti undan mahimaiyai tudi sheyyalAgumO paraman mudalAna pErukkAdiyE param jyOtiyE
pankayak-kanniyE EdammA parAmukham sheyyak-kUDAdammA nI karuNaik-kaDalallavO
     caraNam 2    tAmarai mEl taNNir pOl tayangugirAyE endan mEl dayavu sheyya nalla taruNamidE 
shivakAmiyE abhirAmiyE anudinamum un nAmamE japam allAdonrum nAn ariyEnana shonnEn tAyE
    caraNam 3    nilavin varalAl alli malar nimirndu malaravillaiyO ennai nilattil vAzhavaitta annaiyE sanAtaniyE
pugazhk-kaniyE mAniyE taniyEn enakk-aDaikkalam nEyamODu taruvadun kaDamaiyallavO tAyE
    caraNam 4    shyAmakrSNa sOdarI tudi sheyyAmal iruppEnO un pAdangaLai maravAmalirukka varam taruvAyE 
sukha shyAmaLE nitya kalyANI tAmadamini sheidAl nAnippO tAnguvEnO tAyE akhilANDEshvarI
